mapper.select: /* sendMessage.selectAddrGrpList 주소록 그룹 목록 조회 */ SELECT CACG.ADDRESS_CATEGORY_GRP_ID , NULL AS ADDRESS_CATEGORY_ID , CACG.DIS_ORDER AS GRP_DIS_ORDER , NULL AS DIS_ORDER , CACG.ADDRESS_CATEGORY_GRP_NAME AS ADDRESS_NAME , NULL AS PAR_ADDRESS_CATEGORY_ID FROM CM_ADDR_CATE_GRP CACG WHERE CACG.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CACG.CORP_ID = #{corpId} AND CACG.PROJECT_ID IN ('ALL', #{projectId}) ORDER BY CACG.DIS_ORDER

/* sendMessage.selectAddrCtgyList 주소록 카테고리 목록 조회 */ SELECT CAC.ADDRESS_CATEGORY_ID , CAC.ADDRESS_CATEGORY_GRP_ID , NULL AS GRP_DIS_ORDER , CAC.DIS_ORDER , CAC.ADDRESS_CATEGORY_NAME AS ADDRESS_NAME , CAC.PAR_ADDRESS_CATEGORY_ID FROM CM_ADDR_CATE_GRP CACG
INNER JOIN ( SELECT @ids := GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT XCACM.ADDRESS_CATEGORY_ID) FROM CM_ADDR_CATE_MEM XCACM INNER JOIN CM_CU_INFO XCCI ON XCACM.CU_INFO_ID = XCCI.CU_INFO_ID AND XCCI.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE 1=1
AND XCCI.CUID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND XCCI.CU_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND XCCI.HP_NUMBER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
) VARS
INNER JOIN CM_ADDR_CATE CAC ON CACG.ADDRESS_CATEGORY_GRP_ID = CAC.ADDRESS_CATEGORY_GRP_ID AND CAC.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND FIND_IN_SET(CAC.ADDRESS_CATEGORY_ID, fnc_addr_hierarchi_id(@ids))
WHERE CACG.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CACG.CORP_ID = #{corpId} AND CACG.PROJECT_ID IN ('ALL', #{projectId}) ORDER BY CAC.DIS_ORDER

mapper.select: /* sendMessage.selectCmCuListCnt 주소록 카테고리 구성원 목록 카운트 조회 */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM CM_ADDR_CATE_MEM CACM INNER JOIN CM_CU_INFO CCI ON CACM.CU_INFO_ID = CCI.CU_INFO_ID AND CCI.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE 1=1

/* sendMessage.selectAllAddrCuList 주소록 전체 구성원 목록 조회 */ SELECT CCI.CUID , CCI.HP_NUMBER AS PHONE , @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS CLI_KEY FROM CM_ADDR_CATE_GRP CACG INNER JOIN CM_ADDR_CATE CAC ON CACG.ADDRESS_CATEGORY_GRP_ID = CAC.ADDRESS_CATEGORY_GRP_ID AND CAC.DEL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN CM_ADDR_CATE_MEM CACM ON CACM.ADDRESS_CATEGORY_ID = CAC.ADDRESS_CATEGORY_ID INNER JOIN CM_CU_INFO CCI ON CACM.CU_INFO_ID = CCI.CU_INFO_ID AND CCI.USE_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) TMP WHERE CACG.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CACG.CORP_ID = #{corpId} AND CACG.PROJECT_ID IN ('ALL', #{projectId})

/* sendMessage.selectMsgFeePerOne 메시지 발송 가격 */ SELECT MAX(IFNULL(CCPU.PREE_FEE, CPU.PREE_FEE)) AS MAX_FEE FROM cm_bo.CM_PRODUCT_UNIT CPU LEFT OUTER JOIN CM_CORP_PRODUCT_UNIT CCPU ON CPU.PRODUCT_CODE = CCPU.PRODUCT_CODE AND CCPU.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE CPU.USE_YN = 'Y' AND ( 1=2
OR (CPU.CH_GRP = 'PUSH' AND CPU.CH = 'PUSH') /*PUSH*/
OR (CPU.CH_GRP = 'XMS' AND CPU.CH = 'SMS') /*SMS*/
OR (CPU.CH_GRP = 'XMS' AND CPU.CH = 'LMS') /*LMS*/
OR (CPU.CH_GRP = 'XMS' AND CPU.CH = 'MMS') /*MMS*/
OR (CPU.CH_GRP = 'KAKAO' AND CPU.CH = 'ALIMTALK') /*ALIMTALK*/
OR (CPU.CH_GRP = 'KAKAO' AND CPU.CH = 'PUSH' AND CPU.SPEC = 'TEXT') /*FRENDTALK-TEXT*/
OR (CPU.CH_GRP = 'KAKAO' AND CPU.CH = 'PUSH' AND CPU.SPEC = 'IMAGE') /*FRENDTALK-IMAGE*/
OR (CPU.CH_GRP = 'KAKAO' AND CPU.CH = 'PUSH' AND CPU.SPEC = 'WIDE') /*FRENDTALK-WIDE*/
)
